sentences.en: According to Mandy, Pat's tough exterior hides a shy and sensitive soul.
sentences.cn: 据曼迪说，帕特彪悍的外表下隐藏着一颗害羞且敏感的心。

sentences.en: Beneath his brash exterior, he's still a little boy inside.
sentences.cn: 他外表盛气凌人，内心里还是个孩子。

sentences.en: Beneath his gruff exterior, he's really very kind-hearted.
sentences.cn: 他外表冷漠，心地却十分善良。

sentences.en: Her rather tough and worldly exterior hides a very soft and sensitive heart.
sentences.cn: 她那强硬而世故的外表下掩藏着一颗温柔而敏感的心。

sentences.en: His bluff exterior belied a connoisseur of antiques.
sentences.cn: 他作风粗放,令人看不出他是古董鉴赏家.

sentences.en: His gruff exterior concealed one of the kindest hearts.
sentences.cn: 他粗暴的外表下藏着一颗非常善良的心。

sentences.en: In one ad the viewer scarcely sees the car's exterior.
sentences.cn: 在一则广告中，观众几乎看不到汽车的外观。

sentences.en: One metre of fabric is sufficient to cover the exterior of an 18-in-diameter hatbox.
sentences.cn: 一米布足以包裹住直径为18英寸的帽盒。

sentences.en: She's proud and stubborn, you know, under that pliant exterior.
sentences.cn: 你要知道，在温顺的外表下，她既自傲又固执。

sentences.en: The bags have tough exterior materials to protect against knocks, rain and dust.
sentences.cn: 这些包的面料非常结实耐用，可以防撞、防雨并防尘。

sentences.en: The dome is tiled on the exterior.
The exterior of the building was elegant and graceful.
sentences.cn: 这座大厦外观雅致而优美。

sentences.en: The exterior of the house needs painting.
The exterior shots were taken in Bermuda.
sentences.cn: 外景镜头是在百慕大拍摄的.

sentences.en: The exterior walls need a new coat of paint.
The male reproductive organs are exterior to the body.
sentences.cn: 男性生殖器在身体的外部.

sentences.en: The production unit of the Beijing Film Studio will leave Beijing for other parts of the country to film the exterior next month.
sentences.cn: 北京电影制片厂摄制组下个月去外地拍外景.

words.tran_cn: 外部的；表面的；[药] 外用的；外国的；外面的

trans.tran_en: the outside of something, especially a building
the outside of something, especially a building
